ccre.rconf

Class RConf

  • java.lang.Object
    • ccre.rconf.RConf

  • public class RConf
extends java.lang.Object
    The RConf subsystem's utility class. The basic idea of RConf is best understood like a web browser or other client - the client (usually the PoultryInspector) requests a snapshot of data from an RConfable device, and then displays it to the user once received. The user can then interact with certain components of the result in certain ways, and this sends data back to the original RConfable. (The RConfable, of course, doesn't have to do anything with this data.)
    Author:
    skeggsc

      An entry as part of the result from querying an RConfable.

    • Field Detail

      • F_TITLE

        public static final byte F_TITLE
        The type of a TITLE component. This has large text, and is used for clearly describing the device.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • F_BOOLEAN

        public static final byte F_BOOLEAN
        The type of a BOOLEAN component. This can be either true or false, and the user can set it to true or false remotely if the RConfable wants.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • F_INTEGER

        public static final byte F_INTEGER
        The type of an INTEGER component. This can be any integer, and the user can modify it remotely if the RConfable wants.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • F_FLOAT

        public static final byte F_FLOAT
        The type of a FLOAT component. This can be any float, and the user can modify it remotely if the RConfable wants.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • F_STRING

        public static final byte F_STRING
        The type of a STRING component. This is displayed with normal-sized text, and the user can modify it remotely if the RConfable wants.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • F_BUTTON

        public static final byte F_BUTTON
        The type of a BUTTON component. This is displayed with a border, and the user can press it.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • F_CLUCK_REF

        public static final byte F_CLUCK_REF
        The type of a CLUCK reference. This allows for, essentially, a "link" to another entry on the Cluck network. The path is relative to the RConfable's publishing location.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • F_AUTO_REFRESH

        public static final byte F_AUTO_REFRESH
        The type of an AUTOREFERENCE reference. This strongly implies to the client that it should refresh every some number of milliseconds.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
